author: ruwan
msg: we should not set null as the ERROR_EXCEPTION property because we do not have nything to overight this field and it will clear any exceptions which causes the root issue of this failure.

author: costin
msg: Another refactoring of the async stuff - moved all pieces in the same package, a bit better names.
Added one of the test servers - a simple non-blocking socks server.
I've been using it on my machine ( and phone ) for few weeks, it's a nice way to see the log of all
connections made, and seems a good test for the nio madness.
The code no longer depends on tomcat.util - just nio Buffers and plain java.
